subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick lost to the third-seeded Novak Djokovic, 7-6 (4), 6-4, in the quarterfinals of the Rogers Cup yesterday in Montreal. Roger Federer, the top seed and defending champion, advanced to the semifinals with a 6-3, 6-4 victory over Lleyton Hewitt. Federer will play Radek Stepanek, who was a 6-4, 7-5 winner over Nikolay Davydenko.
